scripts.build:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-vue && gulp build-react && gulp build-svelte"
scripts.build:prod: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-vue && gulp build-react && gulp build-svelte"
scripts.dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-vue && gulp build-react && gulp build-svelte && gulp ks-core && gulp ks-react && gulp ks-vue && gulp ks-svelte && gulp server"
scripts.prod: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "gulp ks-core && gulp ks-react && gulp ks-vue && gulp server"
scripts.ks:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp ks-core && gulp ks-react && gulp ks-vue && gulp ks-svelte"
scripts.ks:prod: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "gulp ks-core && gulp ks-react && gulp ks-vue && gulp ks-svelte"
scripts.core:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp ks-core && gulp server-core"
scripts.react:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-react && gulp ks-react && gulp server-react"
scripts.vue:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-vue && gulp ks-vue && gulp server-vue"
scripts.svelte:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp build-svelte && gulp ks-svelte && gulp server-svelte"
scripts.test: npm run build:dev && npm run lint
scripts.postinstall:
echo "[35m[1mLove Framework7? Support project by donating or pledging on patreon:[22m[39m
 > [32mhttps://patreon.com/vladimirkharlampidi[0m
"
